Package info.dnsdb.client

package info.dnsdb.client
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Client
    Interface for a DNSDB 2.0 with Flexible Search client.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    HTTPClient
    Implementation of a DNSDB 2.0 with Flexible Search client.
    Query
    An object used for setting parameters and executing DNSDB Queries.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    DNSDBException
    Base exception raised by DNSDB clients.
    InvalidJSONException
    Exception raised if JSON data fails to decode.
    QueryFailedException
    Exception raised when the DNSDB server reports via SAF that a query has failed.
    QueryLimitedException
    Exception raised when the DNSDB server reports via SAF that a query has exceeded its row limit.
    SAFException
    Exception raised when the DNSDB server reports a warning or failure via SAF.
    TruncatedResponseException
    Exception raised when the DNSDB server connection is closed without sending a trailer messsage.
    UnexpectedCondException
    Exception raised when the DNSDB server sends a message with an unexpected condition.
